mapper.select: select en.id, en.intern_notice_title, en.intern_notice_subtitle, en.intern_notice_status, en.company_id, en.created_datetime, en.updated_datetime, jc.job_name as job_category_name from tbl_intern_notice en join tbl_intern_job_category ejc on en.id = ejc.intern_notice_id join tbl_job_category jc on ejc.job_category = jc.id left join tbl_request_intern re on en.id = re.intern_notice_id left join tbl_save_intern_notice sen on en.id = sen.intern_notice_id where en.id = #{internNoticeId} group by en.id, jc.job_name

select count(*) from tbl_request_intern re join tbl_user u on re.member_id = u.id join tbl_intern_notice en on re.intern_notice_id = en.id where en.id = #{internNoticeId} and u.user_status = 'active'
and re.request_intern_status = #{status}
